Legal

Introduction

Full names and titles of the people with whom we're doing business. To make sure there are no misunderstandings, every contract we write is clear, specific and detailed enough to cover all the important points or clauses.

Services

The Clovis Group acknowledges that the services rendered under this Agreement shall be solely as an independent contractor. The Clovis Group shall not enter into any contract or commitment on behalf of Client. The Clovis Group further acknowledges that it is not considered an affiliate or subsidiary of Client, and is not entitled to any Client employment rights or benefits. It is expressly understood that this undertaking is not a joint venture.

Requirements

Failure by the client to deliver their required contributions will result in termination of the contract and forfeiture of their deposit.

Termination

  • With Notice
  • Without Notice

Termination : With Notice

Either Party may terminate this Agreement at any time for convenience with 10 Business Days prior written notice to the other party.

Termination : Without Notice

The Customer or the Consultant may terminate this Agreement at any time in the event that either of the Parties breaches any part of this Agreement (the “Breaching Party”), so long as prior written notice is given by the Terminating Party and the breach is not remedied by the Breaching Party within 30 Business Days, defined as any day that is not a Saturday, Sunday or Statutory Holiday

Warranties

The Clovis Group represents and warrants to Client that it has the experience and ability to perform the services required by this Agreement.

Responsibilities

The Clovis Group shall comply with all office rules and regulations, including security requirements, when on Client premises.

Timeline

The Clovis Group Consultant shall allocate the time required to complete the Services for the Customer in a professional manner. It is a material term of this Agreement that the Consultant shall complete the Services within the term set-out in our agreement.

Compensation & Term

Failure by the client to deliver their required contributions will result in termination of the contract and forfeiture of their deposit.

The Clovis Group
